summary: An add-on for the mod Shadow of Morrowind including navmesh, creatures, weathers, ground textures, landscape additions, and LOD.  Updated 7/30 added missing assets for DynDOLOD
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Shadow of Morrowind Overhaul[/size]

[size=2]by mobiusbelmont
[/size][/center][size=3]General Information[/size]:

- This mod adds navmesh, some new locations, creatures, more diverse weathers, new landscape textures, more trees and mountains, and object LOD to the mod Shadow of Morrowind

- It does NOT add NPCs, quests, or new interiors 

- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35789/]Shadow of Morrowind[/url] and all DLCs are required

[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/c643eabb679da13eaac70a004cf8f9cd/tumblr_paqjipndxO1s2ptqso5_1280.jpg[/img]﻿
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/58ca910a81b033510cdfa1216703f2d8/tumblr_p204kbEk9S1s2ptqso1_1280.jpg[/img]
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/3ea5255c0f33e90b93c8a6c46666a67c/tumblr_paqjipndxO1s2ptqso2_1280.jpg[/img]﻿
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/f73fb0db8e94f2f5ea553b395644e3bf/tumblr_paqjipndxO1s2ptqso4_1280.jpg[/img]﻿
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/0d5375aee8d9e4530923a500c6b311c7/tumblr_paqjtasBNE1s2ptqso4_1280.jpg[/img]﻿
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/879239b2fbef4ee32398a6a5ba18a627/tumblr_pbmqk9Je9E1s2ptqso1_1280.jpg[/img]﻿
[img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/253571e3fd75cfd64c9e3115b60de80d/tumblr_p8wu00nORz1w7o4ndo1_1280.jpg[/img]﻿



[size=4]Installation:[/size]
- ALL DLCs for Skryim required
- Install Shadow of Morrowind main mod, update, and map fix.  Then install this mod and overwrite when asked
- If updating from version 1.0, uninstall previous version with mod manager (manually, just install the update and overwrite when asked)
- DynDOLOD and TES5LODGen users make sure to grab the updated billboards AND the additional assets in the optional files section.   When installing the optional assets for LOD generation, overwrite when asked (sorry for some of the duplicate files) 



[size=4]Recommended Mods[/size]:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41561]Red Mountain Erupts[/url] will make the smoke/ash plume look really good (this is not needed if you use DynDOLOD and the DLC Vvardenfell Plume option)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55551]Nyhus and The Border of Cyrodiil[/url] will add some boat travel options to Morrowind (future plans include a border crossing from southern Morrowind to Pryai Village)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59721]DynDOLOD [/url]for the best LOD possible (make sure to grab the billboards and LOD assets from the optional files section, you need both!)


note: This mod is compatible with other landscape overhauls if they contain billboards, and if you use either DynDOLOD or TES5LODGen to regenerate the distant tree LOD


Check out my [url=https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLuLylWFjrFJUOfYa25YR1kLmlOUVOCVta]video series[/url] detailing some of the edits i've made to this worldspace
[youtube]Pt-SFwEXMsI[/youtube]


Changelog
version 1.0 : initial release
version 1.1: 
﻿all LOD objects consolidated into one file
﻿all textures consolidated into one file
fixed some landscape issues and floating objects
﻿added LODSettings file to replace the one from SoM
﻿added over 100 billboards for trees, mushrooms, and flora
update 1.1:
﻿added missing assets LOD generation
 


[size=4]Credits:[/size]
SoM Team for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35789/]Shadow of Morrowind[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89190]Mihail Mods for additional creatures [/url]
Hoddminir [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55158/]Flowers [/url]and [url=https://www.darkcreations.org/hoddminir/category/modders-resources]Landscapes[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19268/?]GKB trees[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61932/]3AM trees[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26192/]More Colorful Trees
[/url]The region editor tutorial by Hoddminir was extremely helpful in making this mod
billboards created by yours truly using Zilav's Billboard generator
landscape, object and tree LOD for Morrowind was created with xEditLODGen Beta7 by Sheson
Additional Object LOD created by yours truly
author: mobiusbelmont
